metadata.title: CVE-2022-48686 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nvme-tcp: fix UAF when detecting digest errorsWe should also bail from the io_work loop when we set rd_enabled to true,so we don't attempt to read data from the socket when the TCP stream isalready out-of-sync or corrupted.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
